newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela finance minister facing minor surgery.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela finance minister facing minor surgery.

text.p: Venezuelan Finance Minister Luis Raul Matos Azocar will enter a Caracas hospital this weekend for a second hernia operation on the groin, the Finance Ministry announced in a release.
Matos was expected to require about two weeks to recover from the operation which will be carried out early next week, the release said.
During his absence, Deputy Finance Minister Wilmer Perez will assume Matos' duties.
